Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory107.png'}
{3: 'A few days after the meeting...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'Miss Luna, did you require my presence?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'Yes. About our plans...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Is this about "her?" If so, you need not worry. She is an easy find.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'You know that I\'m not directing you to "find" her.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'But instead, I need you to remind her of her duty as an agent of the network. Don\'t "save" people to her own whims.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'I patched up and upgraded your frame, not to have you play detective for a massive light bulb.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Miss Luna... You truly expect her to listen to me?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'You must know that she is not one that easily sways.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'As long as it serves to warn her.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "But with me, Miss Luna? I'm afraid a person of your stature might be required for her to listen.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Or, pardon my forthrightness, Miss Luna... Are you apprehensive of being beguiled by her?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Surely, you know what that entails.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Disregarding one\'s duties as an agent, with no heed to the aptitude of the target, "saving" people with the power of Asc-net to one\'s whims...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Such an existence is an intolerable betrayal to the network itself.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'You heard me—Silence.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: '...My apologies.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'But, please, Miss Luna. Do reconsider...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With a most solemn expression unbefitting of Roland, he leaves.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory108.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'You should not have met Miss Luna with such impudence.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'Well, Gabriel. Even if I\'d stayed mute, "her" issue won\'t magically solve itself.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "We've already had a taste of the new Ascendants she gave life to.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Just that Qu alone had us mobilize an entire region of Corrupted to deal with her.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'But, we succeeded in the end.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'And the price?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'All of us Ascendants were put on the line, and the several hundred thousands of Corrupted lost...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Worth.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Tch. You are such a derriere sometimes, Gabriel.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: '"Worth"? What do you mean worth? Are we going all-in on every single faction in this world?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "And our enemies aren't just target dummies—they learn. After a war of such magnitude, they will develop plans to counter us.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "...Don't forget, Gabriel. In the end, we only have so few of us.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'We only require victors who can live through the "filter."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'A land of only "victors"... I\'ve heard this spiel more than a thousand times.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Not everyone is like you, Gabriel.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'So what?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: '...Yeah, I guess. "So what?"', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory107.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: 'Whip-boy seems a bit off.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Alpha does a cut-throat gesture with her thumb.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "...He's the least of our worries.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'At the very least, what Roland said was right.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: '"She" is not one to listen.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'She will have to realize—that these "randomly saved" people will have no future to speak of.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Something the scale of Kowloong though... That's out of the equation for now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "But, if it's to make an example... I'll still gladly do it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: "Got it. I'll get moving.", 4: '2'}
